Atom¶

class src.atom.Atom(name)[source]¶
class Atom¶

This class groups informations about an atom.

name¶

Name of the atom

Type:str
coords¶

3D coordinates of the atom

Type:Numpy array
set_coords(coords)[source]¶

Sets the coordinates of the atom.

Parameters:coords (Numpy array) – x,y,z coordinates.
